title: Brash for It
author: Chelsea Camaron
description: In scars lie stories. Our story is beauty in the broken in this passion-fueled ride … are you ready? Kellum 'Pretty Boy' Oleander, raised under the safety of the Hellions, is the wild card with a scarred face and a reputation to match. Kristen Hope Mayers, once living a jet-setting life, finds herself broken and changed. Their chance encounter leads to an intense, passionate journey as two broken souls collide. This novel is currently the #1 best-selling romantic suspense on Apple Books and is trending on BookTok for its intense chemistry and emotional depth.

title: Forever Country
author: Kathleen Brooks
description: Holt Everett, a country music superstar, finds his life upended when Annaleigh Astore, an entertainment agent receiving threats, seeks his help. As their relationship heats up, so do the dangers, leading to a suspenseful and romantic journey. This book is popular for its blend of celebrity romance and suspenseful plot twists, and is frequently recommended on romance forums and TikTok.

title: Forever Remembered
author: Kathleen Brooks
description: Knox Everett, a professional quarterback, reconnects with his college crush, Quinn Kennedy, who is now embroiled in a dangerous situation involving illegal gambling. Knox is determined to protect her, risking his career and their chance at love. This title is trending for its second-chance romance and high-stakes suspense.

title: Full Tilt
author: Janet Evanovich & Charlotte Hughes
description: Jamie Swift, a small-town newspaper owner, finds her life turned upside down by her mysterious partner, Maximillian Holt. Together, they navigate political intrigue, crime, and a budding romance in a story filled with danger and humor. This classic romantic suspense has seen a fresh wave of popularity due to social media recommendations.

title: With You and Me and Us
author: Sarah A. Bailey
description: A standalone romantic suspense novel blending emotional depth with gripping tension. The story follows two protagonists whose lives intertwine amidst secrets and danger, set against a backdrop of small-town intrigue. Frequently recommended on BookTok for its blend of heartfelt romance and suspenseful plot twists, with readers praising its character development and slow-burn romance.

title: Hide and Seek
author: Victoria Wilder
description: This novel features a high-stakes game of cat and mouse, where the main characters must confront their pasts while navigating a dangerous present. The romance is tightly woven with the suspense, making it a favorite among fans of the genre. BookTok and Instagram users highlight its fast-paced narrative and the chemistry between the leads.

title: Her Soul to Take: A Paranormal Dark Academia Romance
author: Author not specified
description: While primarily a paranormal romance, this book incorporates strong suspense elements, with a dark academia setting and a plot involving secrets, danger, and forbidden love. The book is a frequent mention in BookTok’s dark romance and romantic suspense circles, especially for readers who enjoy a supernatural twist to their suspense.

title: Nocticadia
author: Author not specified
description: A blend of romantic suspense and fantasy, 'Nocticadia' features a mysterious world, a brooding love interest, and a protagonist caught in a web of secrets and danger. Its unique mix of genres and atmospheric storytelling have made it a BookTok favorite, with many users recommending it for fans of both romance and suspense.

title: Onyx Storm
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: A romantasy featuring anti-hero themes, magical intrigue, and high emotional stakes. This title has gained significant traction on BookTok for its blend of romance and fantasy world-building, and is frequently featured in TikTok 'must-read' lists and Instagram reels.

title: Bride
author: Ali Hazelwood
description: A paranormal romance that has gone viral for its unique take on supernatural romance, blending Hazelwood’s signature wit with dark, magical elements. One of the most talked-about books on BookTok, with thousands of user-generated reviews and themed content.
